subject: Re: [junit] looking for PrivledgedAccess.java
msgSnippet: ... In JUnit-addons, I think. Either that, or JUnitX. -- J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger Diaspar Software Services http://www.diasparsoftware.com Author, JUnit
messageBody:
mark_lybarger wrote:
>
>
> i came across references to a ProvledgedAccess.java class that allows
> testing of private methods of a class. the reference pointed to this
> yahoo group as having this class. could someone point me to where i
> might find this?

In JUnit-addons, I think. Either that, or JUnitX.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
